data.name: The Eyes of Ara Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Experience The Eyes of Ara’s beautiful, sweeping score with this Original Soundtrack by the game's composer, Matt Caradus. Provided in both high quality 320kbps MP3 format and uncompressed FLAC format.


Track list:
1 - The Eyes of Ara Opening Titles
2 - Chapter 1: Abandoned Halls
3 - Chapter 1: Ambience
4 - Chapter 2: Memories of Times Past
5 - Chapter 2: Ambience
6 - Chapter 3: The Pursuit of Knowledge
7 - Chapter 3: Ambience
8 - Finale: The Eyes Depart
9 - Castle Ambience
10 - The Eyes Theme

Total length: 18:38
Includes Album Art

Installation Directory

Once purchased, the Original Soundtrack DLC will download to your game directory. By default this is:

...Steam\SteamApps\common\The Eyes of Ara\The Eyes of Ara OST

Note: Due to the folder containing both MP3 and FLAC versions of the soundtrack, the Steam Music player may list duplicate tracks. To solve this, simply open up the directory and delete the version you don't want, then refresh the Music Library.
